Marathwada Institute of Technology, Rotegaon - MSBTE

publication.title: Classification of Classical Indian Music Tabla Taals using Deep Learning

projects.title: Classification of Classical Indian Music Tabla Strokes
description: Developed and implemented a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) tailored for the automated classification of Classical Indian Tabla Taals, exhibiting a high degree of accuracy in discerning complex rhythmic patterns across various taals, including adhatrital, ektaal, rupak, dadra, deepchandi, jhaptal, trital and bhajani.
Developed a user-friendly GUI for instant Tabla stroke recognition in audio files, bridging advanced machine learning with traditional music.

projects.title: Revolutionizing Agriculture through Soil-Driven Crop Selection
description: Implemented a cost-effective solution utilizing the K-nearest neighbour algorithm, providing farmers with a powerful tool to recommend suitable crops based on key soil parameters such as moisture, temperature, humidity, and pH values.
This approach contributes to informed decision-making for optimized crop selection.

projects.title: Music Genre Recognition for Marathi (Regional) language using Machine Learning
description: Developed a music genre classification model focusing on Marathi songs using machine learning algorithms.
Extracted various features from music tracks to train the model, enhancing its accuracy.
Implemented Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) algorithms to classify Marathi songs into distinct genres.
Designed a user-friendly Graphical User Interface (GUI) enabling users to input MP3 files for genre recognition.

certifications: RHCSA- Red Hat Certified System Administrator

volunteer.description: Volunteered in the effective implementation of UTKARSH 2022-2023 initiative by the Social Welfare & Development Committee at VIT Pune, emphasizing on uplifting the spirits of school children
